pages.text: The $(mob)Basalz$() is a monster that spawns in mountainous and wastelands-like biomes. It floats in the air and attacks players on sight.$(p)Its attacks consists of volleys of 3 projectiles. These projectiles apply $(thing)Weakness$() on hit.

$(mob)Basalzes$() drop $(item)Basalz Rods$() on death. It can be crafted into $(item)Basalz Powder$(), which can then be brewed into $(item)Potions of Haste$() or crafted into $(item)Petrotheum Dust$().
